comments.message: would there be any more training classes of this kind in near future

comments.author: Akbarsait
comments.message: Yaah we are planning for one and will keep posted here about the information.

comments.author: alecken
comments.message:
When I searched for CF training, almost all of them are for basic training. Is there a way to post a more advance topic such as how to work with XML. how to work with 3rd party API, how to work with components???? 
This is more for the CF developer who have been working with CF for awhile but who have not yet had the opportunity to work with these fancy stuffs.
